p.n: The Big Match Revisited: The Big Match Revisited - 1974/75
p.k: A look back at some classic editions of The Big Match. This episode, from 1st December 1974, features Crystal Palace v Charlton, Newcastle v Man City and Luton v Burnley

p.n: Classic Premier League: West Ham v Leicester City 1997/98

p.k: We revisit Fulham's visit to Manchester United from the 2003/4 Premier League Season. United came into the game having only lost one of their nine league

p.n: Classic Premier League: Manchester City v Fulham 2007/08
p.k: We revisit this Premier League clash between Manchester City and Fulham. The visitors needed all three points to keep alive their hopes of staying in the top flight

p.k: We revisit the 2017/18 Bundesliga clash between Cologne and Freiburg, with Cologne needing a win to stay in the Bundesliga

p.n: UEFA Europa League: Man Utd v Liverpool 2015/16
p.k: Manchester United took on rivals Liverpool in the second leg of the 2015/16 Europa League last 16 at Old Trafford. Liverpool were comfortable 2-0 winners in the first leg

p.n: UEFA Europa League: Liverpool v B Dortmund 2015/16

p.n: UEFA Europa League: Liverpool v Villarreal 2015/16

p.n: ESPN Classic Boxing: Classic Boxing: Hearns v Andries
p.k: We travel back to March 1987 to revisit this classic light-heavyweight bout between Tommy Hearns and Dennis Andries at the Cobo Hall. Hearns put on a stone ahead of the fight

p.n: ESPN Classic Boxing: Classic Boxing: Monzon v Napoles
p.k: We revisit this classic bout from 1974 between Carlos Monzon, making his ninth defence of the World Middleweight Championship and Jose Napoles in Puteaux

p.n: ESPN Classic Boxing: Muhammad Ali v George Chuvalo
p.k: Another chance to watch the classic 1972 bout between Muhammad Ali and George Chuvalo in Vancouver

p.n: UFC: UFC 239: Jones v Santos

p.n: UFC: UFC 240: Holloway v Edgar
p.k: A look back as Max Holloway and Frankie Edgar did battle for the featherweight title at UFC 240 in Canada. This programme may contain flashing images
